bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign identical with lao juan 勞倦 , exhaustion to being tired. Xin xiu ben cao 新修本草 Substance Entry bo he 薄荷：人家種之，飲汁發汗，大解勞乏 , “This [herb] is cultivated by man. Drinking its juice makes people sweat. It massively resolves exhaustion that has resulted in fatigue ”.

② Pathological Condition identical with xu lao 虛勞 , depletion exhaustion. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry chai hu 茈 胡：能治熱勞，骨節煩疼，熱氣，肩背疼痛，宣暢血氣，勞乏羸瘦 , “It is able to cure heat exhaustion, an uncomfortable feeling of pain in the bones and joints, pain in the shoulders and back. It stimulates the passage of blood and qi. [It further cures] exhaustion resulting in fatigue and emaciation”.
